pageContext.claim: “You know, a ventilator is a machine. It’s a very complex machine. And to think that we have to order hundreds of thousands — nobody has ever heard of a thing like this. … With that being said, General Motors, Ford, so many companies — I had three calls yesterday directly. Without having to institute — like, 'You will do this' — these companies are making them right now. But to think of these numbers, it’s pretty — it’s pretty mindboggling.”
pageContext.analysis: Neither company was making ventilators when Trump made this comment.
